$schema.$comment: Shows what options are possible, and what options are required. Do not delete this
$schema.description: The click pack metadata schema URL.

id.description: The ID of the click pack. goes in the format of "{username}.{name}," (excluding the comma at the end). username being the name you go by online, and name being the name of this click pack. There is a pattern you have to match which is: lowercase letters allowed, numbers are allowed, hyphens/dashes allowed, and one period (as a seperator from the author and name).

type.description: Is this click pack a **Meme**, or is it **Useful**. Only allows "Useful" or "Meme" to be typed. (**CASE SENSITIVE**)

name.description: The name of the click pack. Should not include the words clicks, releases, or pack. Also special characters **execpt** ' are blocked.

authors.description: The authors of the click pack. First author listed is considered the main author.

gdAccountID.description: If you put a Geometry Dash **Account ID** here, people will be able to click your name to open up for Geometry Dash profile.

click-files.description: All of the click file names for the pack (without the folder name nor the file extension), fills out automaticly if it's accepted on to the clicks index.

releases-files.description: All of the release file names for the pack (without the folder name nor the file extension), fills out automaticly if it's accepted on to the clicks index.
